about_the_game:
Story

You'll die if you enter a site that you're never supposed to enter. You have to run away from the monster. This game is horror game, you go to the hell and you adventure hell
You have to survive in hell

This Game

The Eternal Hell is a short horror anomaly experience (~30 minutes) inspired by liminal spaces and psychological horror walking simulators, like 'The Exit 8', 'Pools', and their virtual predecessor, 'P.T.'.

Game Features

Two endings

Mainly a first person walking simulator.

Realistic graphics.

It's a normal horror game.

SO MANY SECRETS!

One big secret connects all the stories. Each story will have its own secrets for you to uncover.

The building is filled with eerie rooms bearing traces and stories of past inhabitants on each building.

name: Eternal Hell

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 2700U with Radeon Vega Mobile Gfx 2.20 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon[TM] RX Vega 10 Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 Dual Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTS 450 / AMD Radeon HD 5570
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device

This game is horror game, you go to the hell and you adventure hell Each building is filled with eerie rooms with traces and stories of past residents. You have to escape hell
